content: I'm trying to edit some CQL issues I submitted, but it won't let me submit the edits when the "Related URL" is blank (there is an error that Related URL must start with http or https). But then if I put in a CQL URL, it complains because it doesn't start with http://hl7.org/fhir. So the only way I can submit edits is by putting in a bogus related URL that starts with http://hl7.org/fhir.
Yeah, that was accidentally introduced as part of the steps to fix Bryn's issue. Now fixed
